scripts.build:tailwind:dev: postcss public/css/styles.css -o public/app/css/styles.css ; postcss public/css/styles.css -o public/cards/css/styles.css
scripts.build:tailwind:dev:watch: postcss public/css/styles.css -o public/app/css/styles.css -w & postcss public/css/styles.css -o public/cards/css/styles.css -w && kill $!
scripts.build:tailwind: NODE_ENV=production postcss public/css/styles.css -o public/app/css/styles.css ; NODE_ENV=production postcss public/css/styles.css -o public/cards/css/styles.css
scripts.build:chrome: rm public/app/manifest.json ; rm -rf public/app/out ; shadow-cljs release app chrome
scripts.build: yarn build:tailwind ; yarn build:app ; yarn build:cards ; yarn build:chrome
